title: Can not spawn osrf_elevator.world, throws assertion failed error

content.raw:
Following is the exact error:

```
Error [Param.cc:452] Unable to set value [0.816657 0.15 -nan] for key[size]
gzclient: /build/ogre-1.9-mqY1wq/ogre-1.9-1.9.0+dfsg1/OgreMain/src/OgreNode.cpp:630: virtual void Ogre::Node::setScale(const Ogre::Vector3&): Assertion `!inScale.isNaN() && "Invalid vector supplied as parameter"' failed.
escalating to SIGKILL on server
```

Apart from this other worlds work fine on my machine, except issue #2164

Following is the exact error:

Error [Param.cc:452] Unable to set value [0.816657 0.15 -nan] for key[size]

escalating to SIGKILL on server

Apart from this other worlds work fine on my machine, except issue #2164
